name: Verify Audio Settings
description: Validates that audio settings controls work correctly and can mute game sounds.
testObjective: Ensure audio settings properly control game volume including full mute functionality.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Open settings menu and navigate to audio settings
steps.expected: Audio settings panel displays with volume sliders
Audio volume decreases to approximately half
All game sounds should be completely muted

steps.action: Interact with various objects while audio is muted
steps.expected: No sound effects should play, including interaction sounds

steps.action: Restore audio sliders to normal levels

postconditions: Mute functionality silences all audio completely
